name: Matewan Riders Retreat New Remodel , Garage , Cozy
sectionedDescription/access:
We have parking in the front and back of the property and across the street .
We own the post office and lot beside of it where you can park . If parking across street please park In front of the empty lot parallel to the street .
sectionedDescription/description:
Looking to ride the trails , escape into the hills with us. We are Located one mile from the Historic town of Matewan , also known as the Battle of Matewan and the Matewan Massacre. Devil Anse trail 21 trailhead is located directly in front of the town . Outlaw trails are in our backyard,cross the bridge in matewan and you can access these trails .Newly remodeled and  detached Garage for SXS or ATV parking . Enjoy the Best Pizza in all of West Virginia located around the corner and they deliver!

We have two queen beds and two twin beds. We also have futons available with extra pillows and comforters. We have one full bath , and one half bath . 
Two seperate TV spaces , with access to your favorite shows and movies .
Enclosed Porch for all your riding gear ! 
Grill and Fire Pit for outdoor entertainment .

We have parking in the front and back of the property and across the street .
We own the post office and lot beside of it where you can park . If parking across street please park In front of the empty lot parallel to the street .

sectionedDescription/description:
This newly renovated house is located just minutes between the very popular Hatfield McCoy Trail heads for Buffalo Mountain and Devil Anse. The Dollar General grocery store is also located within 1 mile for all of your grocery needs.  This entire house offers 3 bedrooms with 5 beds, full kitchen, living room, washer and dryer, bathroom, fire pit, ping pong table, outdoor grill, and free parking with room for a large trailer.  Additional amenities include WiFi, TV, and a spacious backyard.

You will love staying at our property!  There is plenty of parking on both sides of the house.

We are almost always available by phone or text to help our guests.  We also live right across the street and we live right across the street from the house.  We love interacting with our guests!

Murphy Branch is a wonderful neighborhood.  We have a Dollar General Store approximately 1/2 mile up the road.

Our town is ATV friendly as long as helmets are worn.  There is parking on both sides of the house.

additionalHouseRules:
Please respect the neighbors. 
Return outside chairs to the porch.
Strip used sheets and put them by the laundry room, along with the towels and wash cloths. Please put a load onto wash before departing. We have left a small bottle of detergent. 
Place all trash in the outside bins.
Wash all used dishes and put them away.
Turn A/C to 78, Heat to 58 before departing.
No bikes in grass
No Riding shoes on carpet

rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Our home is located In front of the Devil Anse,Hatfield and McCoy trail 59. Direct access to the Buffalo,and the Rockhouse trail system.We have all the comforts of home,fully furnished kitchen,comfortable living room with dish network and wi fi,new mattresses,charcoal grill. We can accommodate 1-15 guest. We are a few short miles to the town of Matewan,the heart of the Hatfield-McCoy feud,  The Battle of Matewan, Battle of Blair Mountain, and UMWA/Mine Wars. Food, gas,and carwash within 2.5 mi.

Our home is very spacious and comfortable.  If you are staying to ride the Hatfield and McCoy trails or traveling to visit the beautiful town of Matewan. We offer a nice, clean home to return to after a day of sight seeing and riding.

You can reach me by cell (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). Or by email 
(EMAIL HIDDEN)
I will be happy to answer any questions you may have

The neighborhood is peaceful, neighbors walking dogs and kids riding their bicycles. Our home has a large back yard, plenty of privacy for an evening cookout or to set by the fire.

Getting around in Matewan is different than most towns.  You can travel by ATV or by car

The cost is 125$ a night for the first 4 people,  and 15$ each additional guest

sectionedDescription/description:
Almost Heaven Lodging is a place the whole family can enjoy. Conveniently located straight across from Buffalo Mountain Trail 14, You can fill your day with trail riding or hiking in our beautiful mountains.
         The property has a large parking lot to accommodate your ATVs with room to spare.
        You can kick back and relax in the covered outdoor picnic area, while the kids have a blast on the playground, or wading and fishing in the creek.

Almost Heaven Lodging is a very quiet. Has a large parking lot. Covered picnic area to enjoy. It has a three bedroom large living  and kitchen, and laundry in house

We are located at the baseball field in Delbarton, WV. Across from Buffalo Mountain Trail 14

Large parking area on site

We are located across from Buffalo mountain trail 14

sectionedDescription/description:
Private 4 bedroom house equipped with full kitchen, (2) living spaces, dining, 2 full baths, laundry room, kitchenette downstair. Outdoor pavilion area with with charcoal and gas grill, corn hole and fire pit. Free WiFi. Ride straight to buffalo and devil anse trails less than a mile. Or downtown Williamson is 2 miles. 5 access points from house on ATV. Note this house is on a hill. Plenty of parking to hold 5-6 trucks. We have an overflow lot to accommodate oversized trailers if needed.

Outdoor living with BBQ grill with utensils, fire pit with lots of parking. Back porch sitting 😊

Historic downtown Williamson is located 2 miles from the house. Access tug river for kayaking or fishing. The coal house, City Gym, sports Bar, medical spa, Coal Cafe coffee shop, gas station, Mexican restaurant and more!

Our town is ATV friendly. You can ride ATVs on the main roads.

We offer grocery drop, trail passes waiting when you arrive, catering.

The Cub House is a cozy studio apartment, located in the heart of downtown Pikeville.  We are located next door to The University of Pikeville and in close proximity to Pikeville Medical Center.

The Cub House is a professionally decorated space, with all the amenities of home.

Guests have access to the entire apartment. Laundry facilities are provided in the apartment.

I am available by phone or text at 606-454-5104.

We are located next door to The University of Pikeville, in the heart of downtown Pikeville.

Parking is available right in front of the door. 

You will be within walking distance of everything downtown.

sectionedDescription/access: Whole cabin
sectionedDescription/description:
This cozy little cabin is the closest lodge to Braveheart and Rockhouse Trailheads. Located on the Guyandotte river, park your rig and ride your ATV’s anywhere.
Located in a quiet, peaceful community, you will see kids riding their bicycles, duck and geese in the backyard and a puppy or two needing a belly rub! Great folks to welcome you to Hatfield Mcoy trails! Try us once, you’ll be back!

Whole cabin

We are available 24/7 and always close by. As little or as much interaction as you wish!

Less than 1 mile to Rockhouse Trailhead and Braveheart Trailhead. Town of Man, food, nightlife, grocery store, Hardee’s, Wendy’s, Fuel, Dollar General, Ice cream and more!

Park your trailer and ride your machines anywhere!!!

sectionedDescription/description:
Vacation cabin (800 SF), secluded on 300 acre farm, hiking trails, wildlife viewing, 3 fishing ponds, 2 picnic areas, great scenery located in hills of eastern Kentucky. Fully furnished with wood burning fireplace, 1 bunk bed, 1  Queen Size  bed/mattress, (sleeps 4). Nightly.

Available year round.

Located within 10 miles of Yatesville Lake State Park and within 4 miles of downtown Louisa, KY.

located 4 miles from Louisa, Ky, 30 miles from Huntington, WV and Ashland, KY.

name: Country Cottage
sectionedDescription/description:
Country Cottage is located in scenic Southwest Virginia, it's a very private property with direct access to the Spearhead Trails Coal Canyon Trail! This cabin is quiet and perfect for nature lovers and riders with quick access to shopping and local restaurants. Sit on the porch and cookout with the outdoor grill and picnic table on property. This property offers privacy and security for your family as well as your vehicles & UTV's. Not only is it perfect for UTV enthusiasts but families as well!

We typically let guests do self check in, sometimes my husband does like to meet the guests if he’s available when they arrive. We are here should any issues occur.

The cabin is close to the town but still secluded, a 24 hour gas station and restaurants are very close by.

The driveway is steep, any guest with a trailer will need a 4 wheel drive. Any large trailer will need to park on the flat right below the driveway. A 4wd is typically preferred but many cars have made it with no trouble. During the winter months of snow/ice should be present, access to the cabin could be difficult but parking and walking up is an option that others have done. We just like to make guests aware before arrival so they use their judgement.

sectionedDescription/description:
Main Street Lodging has available a second floor apartment​​ in a quiet residential area in the heart of Gilbert with easy access to the Hatfield McCoy Trail.  The Apartment has three bedrooms and can accommodate up to 12 guests.  One bedroom has two queen beds and two bedrooms have two full-sized beds.  A fully equipped kitchen, including pots, pans, silverware, glasses, dishes, coffeemaker, toaster, crockpot, and a microwave is at your disposal.  You will also find a full-sized washer and dr

Main Street Lodging has available a second floor apartment​​ in a quiet residential area in the heart of Gilbert with easy access to the Hatfield McCoy Trail.  The Apartment has three bedrooms and can accommodate up to 12 guests.  One bedroom has two queen beds and two bedrooms have two full-sized beds.  A fully equipped kitchen, including pots, pans, silverware, glasses, dishes, coffeemaker, toaster, crockpot, and a microwave is at your disposal.  You will also find a full-sized washer and dryer located off the kitchen.  A patio area with a fire pit is available for you to relax and enjoy the area.  Plenty of parking is available for your vehicles and trailers.  You can ride your ATV/UTV or dirt bike to the trail entrance, to restaurants, the grocery store, and to all the shops in town.  ​​​​​​​

Gusts will use a 4 digit code to enter using the keypad lock.

Located right in the heart of Gilbert, WV.  Just up from the Speedway gas station in town.

name: Mountain Momma - clean and convenient!
photos/4/caption: Seating for 6, wings fold down for more space around the room.
photos/10/caption: Extra towels, cleaning products, linens available in the living room closet.
primaryHost/about: I am a husband, a father of four and I enjoy good books.  We are a pretty relaxed family and we are very active in our community in southern West Virginia.  Please contact me with any concerns.
sectionedDescription/access: It’s all yours!
sectionedDescription/description:
Mountain Momma is an above-garage apartment in Iaeger, WV.  We are located just a few miles from the Outlaw Trails trailhead at Wilmore Dam, and 12 miles from the Hatfield McCoy trailhead in Welch.  Other nearby HM trails are in Gilbert and War.   The newly-remodeled home offers two bedrooms and one bathroom, with additional sleeping in the living room.   The kitchen has concrete countertops and soft-close cabinets.  A Dollar General store is 1/4 mile away, and we have parking for ATV's.

All of the work on this apartment was completed by 120+ volunteers from 10+ states in 2018-2019.  As Covid-19 has ended the mentoring internship program typically hosted in this housing, we are turning over a new leaf.

It’s all yours!

Our family lives adjacent to this building in our split-level home.  We have young kids who are very friendly and polite!  We will give you your space but are available for whatever you might need.  Our heart is to serve you, see to it you enjoy the stay and earn your 5-star review

We are on Route 52 in Iaeger, the main road in our county.  This is a safe small-town place.

Parking is across the street in an open field for vehicles with trailers.  If no trailer, use the driveway if it's convenient for you.

name: Spacious 3 bedroom cabin with hot tub
photos/47/caption: Lots of parking! Parking pad is well over 100’ and 25’ wide.
photos/49/caption: Full view of parking area. There is roughly 15’ unpaved area (closest to you) for trailer parking if needed. Also plenty of grass to pull up if you need to turn around with a trailer.
sectionedDescription/access: There is plenty of parking on the premises, Probably 6-8 cars could comfortably park at the cabin itself on the flat parking pad. Any additional vehicles could park in the driveway itself. The driveway was just paved with asphalt, so any vehicle can access the cabin. GPS will get you to the cabin and also help navigate to any attractions you want to see/do! There is a keypad lock for self check in and check out.
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in Paintsville, Kentucky.  Gather around the wood fireplace and enjoy a game of pool. There are 2 smart tv's to  binge your favorite shows on. Or unplug and and take in the sights on the wrap around porch with a good book. Enjoy the outdoor kitchen and firepit, then hop  in the 8-person hot tub. located just 5 minutes from hiking trails, Paintsville lake state park and golf course, and local eateries . Walmart is conveniently only 8 minutes away.

This cabin is 3000 square feet, and has plenty of room to spread out. the porch has several rocking chairs, a porch swing and an outdoor dining table and chairs. There is a fire pit outside, near the out door kitchen and sectional. There is a large hot tub, with Bluetooth speakers and lights. The porch has lighting and fans for evening comfort and plenty of seating. The property is secluded on 15 acres, with a view of the mountains. There is a custom pool table also in the living room. There are 4 couches and a recliner in the house.  The master bathroom has heated floors, and a custom walk-in shower with body jets and a bench seat. There are 2 bathtub/shower combos great for small children. Washer and dryer on site in case any laundry needs to be done while on vacation. Complementary soap and shampoos are provided.

There is plenty of parking on the premises, Probably 6-8 cars could comfortably park at the cabin itself on the flat parking pad. Any additional vehicles could park in the driveway itself. The driveway was just paved with asphalt, so any vehicle can access the cabin. GPS will get you to the cabin and also help navigate to any attractions you want to see/do! There is a keypad lock for self check in and check out.

There is a paved road right up to the driveway, so getting around is a breeze. The gps can get you to any attractions you may want to visit!

There are some neighbors a few hundred yards away, so please be mindful of that in the late evenings to not make too much noise outside. 
Guests are encouraged to bring sandals for getting to and from the hot tub, so it stays clean and usable for other guests. Also if hiking is something you want to do, don't forget to bring a backpack!

name: Downtown Stu Stu Studio
photos/17/caption: Downtown Whitesburg
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest have access to the entire apartment.  If you continue walking down the common hallway of the building there is a stairway that leads to a second entrance directly onto Main Street (best way to access the restaurants downtown).
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in historic downtown Whitesburg this modern studio unit is just steps away from restaurants, the courthouse, public library, downtown nightlife spots with live entertainment, Kentucky Mist Moonshine distillery, Recreation Center, and many more places to visit just a short drive away in the heart of the Appalachian Mountains.

This studio efficiency apartment has just been newly remodeled.  Roughly 400 square feet.  There is a wet bar with sink, microwave, small refrigerator, and coffee maker compatible with K cups.  King size bed, large walk in shower, a sofa, and a desk for any business needs.

Guest have access to the entire apartment.  If you continue walking down the common hallway of the building there is a stairway that leads to a second entrance directly onto Main Street (best way to access the restaurants downtown).

I will not be personally meeting guests for check in but if guests should need anything at all they can call, text, or email at anytime, day or night, and I will assist in anyway I can.

With this unit being located right in the center of downtown, you're within a short walking distance of all restaurants and businesses located on Main Street.  There are 4 restaurants/bars, a moonshine distillery, and many other businesses to visit while in town.

Whitesburg is a small little town and there aren't any local cab companies to get around but you shouldn't have a problem finding anything on your own.  If you have any questions on how to get somewhere or things to do just send me a text and I'll help you out.

Parking for this unit is behind the building located on Hayes Street.  There are 4 spots directly behind the building and then 6 Long parking spots to the side of the building with "permit parking only" signs.  You are welcome to park in any of those spaces that are available.  You can also park in the parking lot just down the hill between Whitaker Bank and Community Trust Bank and also in any of the parallel parking spaces located on Main Street.  The double glass entry doors to the building are located right next to the parking lot on Hayes Street and you'll see the "Apartments on Main" logo on the entry door.

sectionedDescription/access: This space is occupied during the week, available for Airbnb on weekends.
sectionedDescription/description:
This is the ideal space for all your traveling needs. Perfect for business trips or for exploring Letcher County and the beauty and natural wonders of the Pine Mountain area! Several area restaurants and shops are close by. Visit discoverletcher.com for information on all our area has to offer!

Great location for traveling healthcare professionals , close to Whitesburg ARH and Mountain Comprehensive Health Corporation.

This space is occupied during the week, available for Airbnb on weekends.

We are always available to answer any questions that our guests may have and offer any needed recommendations. Guests may call or text.

Whitesburg offers a variety of shops and restaurants close by. Located at the foot of Pine Mountain, Pine Mountain Grill and gift shop boasts scratch cooking, friendly service and a relaxing environment. A women’s boutique, Southern Bliss, is also located beside the restaurant. Annie’s Frugal Finery is an upscale consignment store located across the street.  Downtown Whitesburg offers several unique restaurants including Streetside Bar and Grill, Dawahares 109 Pizza and Summit City . Visit Kentucky Mist Moonshine Distillery https://www.kentuckymist.com/menu , as well as Appalshop and The Cozy Corner gift shop! 
Visit discoverletcher.com for more information!!

sectionedDescription/description:
Experience country charm with our quaint two-bedroom vacation rental. Along with a cozy living room and a handy kitchenette, enjoy high-speed internet, a smart tv and reliable AT&T cell service. Accessible by car and motorcycle, this rural haven perfectly balances tranquility with modern connectivity. A perfect countryside escape!

Full galley kitchen, drop-leaf table, couch and chair as well as two rockers on the porch.

Our caretaker, Richard, lives just across the way and can help take care of anything you might need.

Hike out the back door for miles up the mountain, or drive just 15 minutes north to the New River Gorge with hiking, climbing and rafting on tap anytime.

The cabin is only 8 miles from the center of Beckley, WV, with stores, restaurants, and a movie theater.

name: Cozy Two Bedroom Apartment located in Welch
photos/14/caption: Guests have access to the front yard
photos/15/caption: View from the front door
primaryHost/about: My wife Elise and I have lived in McDowell County since November 2015. We moved from New England to help the community through outreach and ministry and we've fallen in love with the area and the people here. We love to go for walks, listen to music, travel anywhere & everywhere, and meet new friends.
sectionedDescription/access: Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. It is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy the modern and vintage charm of our 1920's home. Located in the heart of McDowell County in Welch, West Virginia. We take pride in offering the most comfortable hypoallergenic bedding for a wonderful night's sleep and the softest towels so our guests will have a lavish experience.

This apartment is located in a home with an additional unit across the hall and it is above another apartment. It is located across the way from City Hall and the Welch Library.

We thoroughly clean and disinfect after each guest's stay. The cleaners and detergents used on our property are eco-friendly, sustainable and biodegradable.

Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. It is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.

As hosts, we are always available for any assistance and advice while guests navigate the area.

There is truly no other place like Welch, WV. Once a booming coal town, Welch now has a much smaller population. Welch and McDowell County have garnered much attention over the past decade. The New York Times and CNN have published and produced different pieces highlighting the county and its unique way of life that still exists here in the mountains. Even the late chef, author, and documentarian, Anthony Bourdain spent time filming in McDowell and was quoted saying it was one of the most unique places he had traveled to.
 https://www.wvpress.org/breaking-news/anthony-bourdain-mcdowell-best-place-earth/

You can see McDowell County's episode on season 11 of Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown.

This home is within walking distance to a gas station, a library, town hall and the movie theatre. The Jack Caffrey Arts and Culture Center is a short distance away. Small shops, grocery stores and restaurants are all one to five miles away. There is a Bluefield Area Transit Bus route that runs through town on weekdays.

There is no kitchen in this unit. There is a key code for the front door of the house and for the apartment door. There are stairs  leading to this apartment.

sectionedDescription/access: This is a small little town with a big personality and plenty of parking.
sectionedDescription/description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. This two bedroom apartment is located in the downtown area of Paintsville Kentucky. As a guest you will be walking distance from the local hospital, restaurants, bars, antique district and much more.
As an interior decorator I change the decor and furniture on a regular basis. So, what you see in the pics may be different when you arrive at the property but I do try to take current photos and upload them in a timely manner.

The entire unit has been recently renovated within the month of May 2023 with new flooring, complete new kitchen, enlarged bathroom etc. and freshly painted.
The unit has an open concept kitchen, breakfast area, and living room. 
The two bedrooms are very spacious. 
A desk/work area is located in one of the bedrooms. 
The Bathroom as been recently renovated and enlarged. The bathroom sink has a gorgeous granite top. 
There are granite countertops and gorgeous tile backsplash in the kitchen. The refrigerator, Dishwasher, Stove, and microwave are all stainless steel new or recently purchased. New Pots and Pans were recently purchased for the kitchen.
The unit has beautiful but durable faux grey stone flooring for easy cleaning and no carpeting.
New wooden blinds were installed on all windows May 2023. 
There is an outdoor area near the front door with a square, patio table and four chairs.

This is a small little town with a big personality and plenty of parking.

I will be available to help you with anything of concern in regards to your stay. I also have a back up person who is available in case I have an emergency or have to be out of town.
Maintenance is done on Tuesdays and Wednesdays by Tuscany maintenance. 
All guests will be notified when maintenance has to enter the property or be on the property.

This is a very safe neighborhood in comparison to other places. 
The town has a lot of historical homes that are on the Kentucky historical home registry.
I really enjoy walking through the town and looking at the Architecture.

There are a plethora of things within walking distance of the rental unit. Restaurants, bars, antique shops, hair salons, Library etc. 
The local hospital is directly behind the rental unit.
MedExpress pharmacy is located across the bridge and to the left less than a quarter of a mile and located on the right. 
Med Express pharmacy is open Monday through Friday.

The unit is Covid clean upon guest arrival. 
Once a guest is in the Airbnb they are responsible for cleaning it. I like to give my guest full privacy and reduce the number of people who touch things due to Covid.
I do have an excellent housekeeper if you would like to obtain her services.

sectionedDescription/access: All outbuildings are off limits.
sectionedDescription/description:
Lovely creek-side cottage with view of Pine Mountain down a long gravel driveway. Quiet neighborhood. Large front yard. Wrap around porch with porch swing. Fire pit and charcoal grill available.

We have  pillows, sheets, towels, washcloths, dish towels, and dish rags as well as a set of cook ware. We have well water that is filtered due to having sulfur and iron in the well. We do recommend bringing drinking water but the water is safe to use. The yard is shared with another Airbnb. Please do not wash the bed linens or towels.

All outbuildings are off limits.

I live close by and I am available as necessary.

Eolia Community Park is 1/4 mile away. We are just 15 minutes from Whitesburg and Cumberland. Beautiful Kingdom Come State Park and Bad Branch Falls are just a short drive away.

There are black bears and coyotes in our area. Do not  leave food or trash outside.  We have well water that is filtered due to having sulfur and iron. It is safe to use but  we do recommend bringing your own  drinking water. Please do not wash the towels or bed linens. Message me if you need anything. Check out is at 10 AM.

Lock all doors when leaving.

name: Riverfront-Dock, Deck, NRG, Fence, Firepit & View!
photos/0/caption: Gorgeous summer evening on the river.
photos/1/caption:
Is there anything more relaxing than this? 
Beautiful views of the Kanawha River and mountains.
photos/2/caption: Adorable 3 bedroom, 1 bath riverfront cottage. Relax on the covered front porch, or sit in the sun on the back patio or front deck.
photos/4/caption: New daybed swing. So comfy and relaxing.
photos/5/caption: Great view of the dock, deck and cottage. Oh,  there’s that new fire pit too!
photos/7/caption: Enjoy a cookout or beverage on the deck, overlooking the Kanawha River. Gas grill and dinnerware provided.
photos/8/caption: Plenty of seating for all guests with views of the TV or the river from the large picture window. Board games and a fun murder mystery game for the whole family. 50” Smart TV.
photos/9/caption: New electric fireplace added for ambiance and warmth on cold winter nights. It’s also so romantic!
photos/10/caption: Cozy chair situated in front of the large picture window where you can read, work, watch TV or watch the boats going up and down the river.
photos/11/caption: Enjoy the view while you work on your laptop!
photos/12/caption: Variety of board games and a murder mystery game!
photos/13/caption: WV and Fayette County history books. Grab one as you head out the door to the deck or covered porch.
photos/14/caption: Relax in the bath or shower after exploring WV all day! Shampoo, Body Wash and other toiletries provided. Wrap up in our luxury towels.
photos/15/caption: Cozy double room with super soft bedding and brand new 2” memory foam topper. All mattresses, boxsprings and pillows have water, dust and bug proof covers. All bedrooms have a 24” smart TV
photos/16/caption: Local art by Connie Mae Mueller. She has many beautiful pieces if you’re interested.
photos/17/caption: Twin trundle bed. Pottery barn furniture with soft comfortable mattresses.
photos/18/caption: Chalkboard wall in the twin trundle room
photos/20/caption: Queen room has a new memory foam topper. Mattress, boxspring and pillows all have encasements that are water, dust and bug proof. Super soft microfiber bedding and cotton quilt. The window has knockout light curtains and a view of the river.  24” TV
photos/21/caption: Soft, plush towels, hand towels and washcloths. Black washcloth for make up removal.
photos/24/caption: Dining table has a leaf if you want to seat 6
photos/25/caption: Who doesn’t love a well stocked coffee bar? Keurig coffee maker/pod combo. Creamer, sugar, and stir sticks provided. Assorted Teas.
photos/26/caption: Kick back after a full day or hiking, kayaking, biking with a bottle of local Kirkwood Winery Wine. On us!
photos/27/caption: Brand new fire-pit overlooking the river.
photos/28/caption: Back patio seating. This spot is right off the kitchen so I great place to drink your coffee in the am. It has a nice view of the river too.
photos/29/caption: Beautiful shot of the Kanawha River from Smithers just down the river.
photos/30/caption: Take your boat through the London Locks to Charleston and enjoy Live On The Levee concert Friday throughout the summer.
photos/34/caption: Kayak or boat down river to “the island”. You can’t miss the island in the river ! You can pull your boat up or kayak out of the water and fish, have a picnic or just swim!
photos/35/caption: Fayetteville area list of restaurants and pubs.
photos/36/caption: The river is a great spot to kayak.
photos/38/caption: Beautiful view of the porch, deck, river and mountains, from inside the cottage.
photos/39/caption: This is a photo showing the islands that you can kayak or boat to!
photos/40/caption: Drone footage of the river and Upper Kanawha Valley.
photos/41/caption: Kayak rentals and fishing tours through The Glen Ferris Inn
primaryHost/about: Beth and Carl Rose are siblings and the owners of Rose River Cottage. They are native West Virginians although Carl now resides in Ohio. After losing their Mother recently, they decided to honor both of their parents by keeping their beautiful riverfront home and sharing it with others.

sectionedDescription/access:
All rooms in the house are available for use. Washer and dryer are in the basement. Locked doors in the basement are off limits. 

Outbuilding is locked and unavailable.
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to this delightful 3 bedroom, 1 bath, riverfront cottage with deck overlooking the Kanawha River. Private dock for fishing or docking your boat. Sleeps 6 comfortably.  Fully equipped kitchen and laundry. Located in a safe, quiet, rural neighborhood halfway between Charleston and Fayetteville. Convenient to outdoor recreational activities. Stay in and cook your own meals or visit a local eatery. No Pets Allowed!

Welcome to this delightful cottage nestled in the heart of the picturesque town of Boomer, WV . Perfectly situated in a serene and peaceful setting, this home offers a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Quiet, kid friendly neighborhood. The cantilever deck overlooks the river which is about 30 steps away.  You can fish off of the dock or tie your boat up to it. Bring your kayaks or canoes and put them in right in front of the house! Beautiful fire pit with seating for 6, overlooking the river and scenic mountains!

Please take note that bedroom 1 (queen room) and bedroom 3 (twin w/trundle bed) share a closet. 

All bedrooms have a  24” smart TV and WIFI. 

The house is a 30 minute scenic drive along the historic Midland Trail to New River Gorge National Park and Preserve. You’ll pass a couple of waterfalls along the way so make a day of it! Fayetteville, voted “coolest small town”, is right along the route to New River Gorge and has many locally owned restaurants and breweries. It's also home of several adventure companies who offer hiking, biking, white water rafting, repelling, ATV riding, horseback riding & so much more! 

Charleston, the state’s capital, is about 40 minutes drive west.  

Summerville Lake State Park is roughly 36 miles from the cottage and offers a nice beach, boat rental, lighthouse and more. 

We hope you love WV and our little piece of Heaven on the river, as much as we do!

All rooms in the house are available for use. Washer and dryer are in the basement. Locked doors in the basement are off limits. 

Outbuilding is locked and unavailable.

We will give you all the space you need but we are only a few streets away if you have any questions or need assistance with something.

Close knit neighborhood. Owners live on another street in the same community. Friendly family atmosphere but being right on the river gives you privacy if you want it.

Street parking is available right next to the house. There is room for up to 4 vehicles. The house is in a rural community so there is no Uber. You need to plan to drive to get around. Neighborhood is friendly for a leisurely walk.

There are games available in the cabinet under the Livingroom TV
Record player and old records are in the cabinet also
Keurig and coffee & tea
Ironing board and iron
Washer and dryer available
Smart TV in living room and all 3 bedrooms
Fire pit
1/2 day fishing trips and kayak rentals available at The Glen Ferris Inn just a few miles away
Trash pickup is early Thursday mornings. Trash must be in bags, which are provided
Grass cutting is early Wednesday mornings
Remove all perishables from the refrigerator upon check out
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Absolutely no parties or events. 
Maximum of 2 dogs allowed 
They must be crated when left alone and cleaned up after, to include the yard.
No smoking. 
No weddings or elopements. 
ALL Trash/Waste must be bagged. NO LOOSE TRASH IN CANS PLEASE.
Please wash dishes upon check out and strip linens from used beds.

primaryHost/about:
My hubby and I have been married for 38 years and have lived on this property for 37.  I work a full-time job and enjoy photography especially birds, wildlife, old barns and scenery. 

My husband does metal roofing and enjoys hunting and fishing.
sectionedDescription/access: The whole place and creek to explore at your own risk.
sectionedDescription/description:
Our "Cozy Cabin" getaway is located in a peaceful country setting. A creek & hillside is located behind the cabin (146 acres). Relax on our 2 porches and  enjoy the view of our field with horses grazing and deer passing thru. We have added a fire pit, picnic table, & gas grill for your outside enjoyment. 
All the amenities for a relaxing stay close to Yatesville Lake (18 miles), Rush Off-Road Park (13 miles) & Giovanni's Pizza (5 miles). Tristate area KY/WV/OH can be in all within 30 minutes.

The Cozy Cabin is fairly new, built just for your stay! We have an open kitchen/living room area set up to prepare and enjoy meals or just relax by the free standing gas fireplace. 
We also have cable tv and high speed internet.
A queen bedroom on the first floor and a huge upstairs bedroom with a king and 2 twin beds along with a sitting area and plenty of storage in the walk-in closet.
A fire pit has been added for a relaxing evening around the fire.

The whole place and creek to explore at your own risk.

We live next door but not too close.

This is a country setting with wildlife and few neighbors. Great place to relax and unwind.
Very romantic !
All you need to bring is your food, we have the rest covered.
Dishes, pots n pans,towels, bedding, all provided.
Everything will be clean and fresh when you arrive.

The Cabin is about 18 miles from Tri-State Airport in Kenova, WV.
12 miles from Louisa KY.
15 miles to Catlettsburg or Kenova WV or  20 miles to Huntington WV.
Close to interstate 64 ! You can be in Kentucky, Ohio or West Virginia within 20-30 minutes.

The woods are full of wildlife and the hills are steep. There is plenty of parking in front but if you need extra parking for trailers please let us know.  There is another property close for rentals if you have a large group! Just ask!

additionalHouseRules:
Additional rules

-Please do not use water hose to wash your machines. The water hose is to be used to spray off muddy clothes only. 

- Please be courteous and remove muddy clothes and boots either outside or in mud room/laundry room. 

-Please do not place muddy clothes in the washer without being sprayed off with water hose first. 

-Please do not use our white bath towels to clean up your machine. 

- Please place all used towels in the hamper located in the bathroom before departure. 

- Guests are responsible to wash all dishes before departure.

- Guests are responsible for making sure the grill is cleaned up after each use. 

-Gather all sheets on beds used and place them in the laundry basket located in the laundry room before departure.

- The house is located in close proximity to wooded areas with wildlife. Please DO NOT feed the Deer or Bears.

-Do not leave any trash or food outside.

- Guests are responsible to clean up any spills and messes they make.

- Place full trash bags in the container outside for pickup.

-No Offroad Vehicles allowed in front yard, on back porch or outside the graveled area.

-If additional parking is needed we have a large parking area about 100 yards from the property for large trailers and trucks. 

- You may not book if you live locally without asking for permission and letting us know why you need a place in town.

- To protect the host and guest, we must verify all guests ahead of the stay. Please be aware: As a part of the verification process, you may be asked to provide a copy of your official government-issued photo ID, confirm your contact information, and pass through our guest portal. The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.

- You understand that your check-in instructions will be sent after successfully completing the guest portal.
 
- THERE WILL BE A $500 CHARGE FOR SMOKING, PARTYING, OR BREAKING ANY OTHER HOUSE RULES!
 
- Please do not bring glitter, confetti, etc. to any of our properties.
 
- Please ensure that you review the cancellation policy as it pertains to any cancellation for any COVID-19 reason. We encourage guests to purchase travel insurance because we cannot operate outside of our cancellation policy for any reason.

- Due to our close proximity to wooded areas, we have a large population of insects, including ladybugs, house flies, stink bugs, millipedes, carpenter bees, and wasps. Although all of our properties are sprayed regularly by a professional pest control company, the mountains are not. During various times of the year, these insects may find their way into the property. By booking, you understand that is a possibility during your stay and understand that there will be no refunds related to bugs getting into the property. We will be happy to work with you to get pest control back out if necessary. 

Hillbilly Rentals, LLC’s Vacation Rental Terms and Conditions  (the “Terms”) apply. Renter will receive and agrees to sign the Terms immediately after making reservation, which will include, but not be limited to, the following:
 - The “Minimum Age” to rent the Property is 18 years of age.
 - By booking you agree to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID directly to us. We will request this after your reservation has been made
 - The Renter is solely responsible for Renter’s actions and the actions of all family members, guests, and invitees.
 - Noise audible outside the Property is prohibited between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m.
 - Unless authorized by the Property Manager, the number of people present at the Property may not exceed the maximum occupancy indicated in the listing or the reservation for the Property.
 - Check-in is 4:00PM and Check-out is before 11:00 AM.
 - If you do not vacate by check-out time, you authorize us to charge a late departure fee of up to one night’s rental and we may remove all Occupants and their personal property from the Property.
 - No smoking is permitted on the inside of the Property at any time. 
 - No animals or pets of any kind are permitted at the Property except bona fide service animals that we are required by law to allow.
 - Renter authorizes us to bill the credit card on file for the full amount of the Rental Fee at the time of booking.  Renter agrees not to make chargeback claims with its credit or debit card issuer.
 - Events and commercial photography or filming are prohibited at the Property without our express written permission.
 - Use of the Property for any criminal activity is prohibited.
 - Neither the Property Manager nor the Owner will be liable for special, incidental, or consequential damages of any kind, including bunk beds on the property.
 - Upon your arrival at the Property, you should inspect the rental unit to ensure the Property condition is to your satisfaction. If you find any conditions you need to report as unsatisfactory or damaged upon your arrival, you should report such conditions within two hours after the time you arrive at the Property. After the two-hour period expires, the Property is provided as is and we are not responsible for the interoperability or unavailability of any amenities.
 - You further agree to give us a reasonable amount of time to respond to your report and to cooperate with our efforts to address the concern or provide a remedy.
 - You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company or the building, as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.

sectionedDescription/description:
⚡️This home is an absolute must see!⚡️ Fully furnished 5 bedroom 2 bath sleeps 14 people. Very quiet neighborhood, owned and operated by owners of Logan Motorcycle Sales authorized Honda, Yamaha, Polaris and Kawasaki dealer with all your Powersports needs. 💥Located 3 miles from downtown Logan, Bearwallow Trail connector, 10 miles to Devil Anse, Rockhouse, and Buffalo Mountain connectors.💥Ride your machine from the house to everything you would ever need or want.

The home is completely furnished with all brand new furniture and appliances. Fire pit and game room for guests to enjoy.

I will be available during your stay if needed and I can keep in touch through text.

We have a huge gravel parking pad located at the home. However if you need more space for parking we have additional parking located 100 yards from the house that is under surveillance for your piece of mind.

Very quiet neighborhood, owned and operated by owners of Logan Motorcycle Sales authorized Honda, Yamaha, Polaris and Kawasaki dealer with all your Powersports needs. 💥Located 3 miles from downtown Logan, Bearwallow Trail connector, 10 miles to Devil Anse, Rockhouse, and Buffalo Mountain connectors.💥Ride your machine from the house to everything you would ever need or want.
sectionedDescription/transit: We have a huge gravel parking pad located at the home. However if you need more space for parking we have additional parking located 100 yards from the house that is under surveillance for your piece of mind.

sectionedDescription/description:
Rustic Cabin with great views, amenities,plenty of parking for trailers and Atvs with easy access to Hatfield and Mccoy trails....Indian Ridge, Pinnacle and Pocahontas Trail Systems. Perfect location for anyone wanting to ride trails or simply relax and get away. From the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

Rustic cabin absolute perfect spot to relax and unwind after a long day riding the trails. Amazing waterfall  views while grilling on your Blackstone out back back. Have a cup a coffee from the Keurig on the back porch to get the day going!!

Mountain Views, quiet are, little traffic. Many opportunities to ride Atvs

sectionedDescription/description: Welcome to the Eagle's Rest! This family & pet friendly cabin is nestled outside of Prestonsburg. Mountainous escapes of sunrises & sunsets w/access to a private 20-acre mountain for hiking & birdwatching. Enjoy plenty of family time w/a game room featuring a bar, billiard table, & dart board. Garage w/fire pit for entertaining or a small RV/Camper! Smart-Tv’s w/DirecTV & T-Mobile Int. Located near StoneCrest Golf Course, Jenny Wiley State Park, & Sugarcamp MtnTrails & Middle Creek Battlefl

primaryHost/about: I'm a lifelong motorcycle racer and rider . I'm 59 years old and have ridden dirt bikes 54 years . I'velived here in Eastern Ky. almost my whole life .
sectionedDescription/description: Hit the Hatfield Mccoy trails or the New Ky Hillbilly trails from our location . You can ride to either one with no trailering and without worries. Over 600 miles of trails between the the 2 . We are conveniently located on U.S. hiway 119 in Belfry Ky. No parking on crowded busy streets or driving around late at nite on narrow winding roads to find us. We also have a large parking area for those big haulers with plenty of turning room . Over 25 restaurants a Walmart and gas stations close by.

name: A Bit of Heaven Rental-Cove House-Warrior Trail
photos/0/caption:
Newly Renovated very nice, clean, spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bath, kitchen and living room house. Perfect fit for large groups or small. Convenient for riding HMT trails or outlaw trails.
Quiet neighborhood plenty of parking for trucks and trailers.
photos/1/caption: Spacious living room with a large sectional sofa and extra seating.  Plenty of comfy seating to lounge around  after a day on the trails. Also includes a futon couch that can be used for additional sleeping arrangements.
photos/2/caption: Amenities include a 65" flatscreen TV with Roku access (Netflix, Prime, etc), high speed Wifi and a designated work space.
photos/3/caption:
Fully equipped, large eat in kitchen. 
Perfect for large groups or a small family to dine in during your stay.
photos/5/caption: Maybe one of the most important things in the house. The coffee pot! Both a single serve as well as a regular pot. If you are like me we gotta have our coffee.
photos/6/caption: Bedroom #1 has 2 queen size comfy beds. Extra blankets and fresh linens. It also has a walk in closet and an on Suite adjoining bathroom.
photos/7/caption:
On suite adjoining bathroom with bedroom #1. Clean towels,
Fully stocked with all the necessities soap, shampoo, etc.
photos/8/caption: On suite bathroom 5' ceramic tiled walk in shower for bedroom #1.
photos/9/caption: Bedroom #2 Sleeps 3. 1 comfy queen size bed and 1 single bed. Clean linens and extra blankets. Clothes hanging rod with hangers.
photos/10/caption: 2nd bathroom shared by bedroom two and 3. Fully stocked necessities hair dryer, soap, shampoo, etc.
photos/11/caption: 2nd bathroom 36" ceramic tiled walk in shower.
photos/12/caption: Bedroom #3 has 2 comfy full size beds. Clean linens and extra blankets. Clothes hanging rods with hangers.
photos/13/caption: Laundry area extra large drum washer and dryer to wash riding clothes. Comes complete with laundry soap and a iron.
photos/14/caption: Yes it's true! We have parking to accommodate your trucks, trailers and equipment.
photos/15/caption: Entrance off of War Cove Circle. Well lit with security lights.
photos/16/caption: Covered Patio/Porch with outdoor seating and a gas grill. Perfect for sitting out at night and watching the stars.
photos/17/caption: Enjoy the evenings sitting by the fire pit talking and spending quality time with your family and friends. There's also a set of corn hole boards in the master closet.
photos/18/caption: Electronic lock for easy check in when you arrive.
photos/19/caption: Exterior security cameras for added security
photos/20/caption: Plenty of parking for trucks and trailers
photos/21/caption: Entrance to the house off of War Cove Circle
photos/24/caption:
Rick and I own A Scoop of Heaven
Best icecream in town. Open seasonally April-October. THU-SAT  from 12-9pm. Stop by and say hey and get a 10% discount.
photos/25/caption: ATV friendly town off load when you get here and drive you ATV where ever you want to go. The Owl serves inexpensive but tasty breakfast, lunch and dinner 6 days a week and lunch and opens at noon on Sundays.
photos/26/caption: Warrior Trailhead office sells HMT passes as well as souvenirs. Located on River Rd. Open from 9am-2pm everyday.
primaryHost/about:
My husband and I relocated to West Virginia in 2014 from Ohio. We run a ministry (A New Beginning) located downtown. 
We opened A Bit of Heaven Rental in Sept. 2018 when the trails opened in our area. We currently have 5 units we rent. We also opened A Scoop of Heaven Icecream in 2021.
We live local across the street from The Calvary House and are available if you need us. We love the small town atmosphere that our town has to offer and the friendly folks that live here.
I love to cook and spend time with our family and grandbabies. 
We enjoy meeting new people, having cookouts in the summer, and going to the lake.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest has full access to the house and yard. This property also has a Suite on the backside of the house that can be purchased along with or seperate.
sectionedDescription/description:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart... 

Surrounded by mountains and located right around the corner from Hatfield McCoys Warrior Trailhead.
Enjoy High Rocks, Wilmore Dam, or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, or hiking. 
Easy access to restaurants, gas and grocery store.  We are an ATV friendly town and house is located in friendly quiet Neighborhood with plenty of parking for trucks and trailers.

The Main house features 3 Bedrooms, 2 full baths, open kitchen-dining room, living room and laundry area. It sleeps up to 13 and is fully equipped with clean linens, towels and bedding.
The Master Bedroom has a private Bath with a large tiled shower. The main bathroom is shared between the 2 remaining bedrooms.

Living room has a 65" flat screen TV with Roku access (Netfix, Prime, etc.) and WIFI. It also has a sectional sofa, extra seating, and a small desk workspace. 

Fully equipped kitchen with dishes, flatware and kitchen utensils . Large covered front porch with a Bbq grill and outdoor seating. Fire ring in the yard for those cool evenings back at the house.
This House has a suite on the backside that can be rented with or separate from the House.
Like us on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.

Guest has full access to the house and yard. This property also has a Suite on the backside of the house that can be purchased along with or seperate.

Our mission is to make your stay at The Cove House as enjoyable as possible. 

We live locally and respect your privacy.  We'll give you the space that you want or the help you might need.

Located on the entrance to Hatfield McCoys Warrior Trail with direct connections to Pinnacle Creek, Indian Ridge and Pocahantas Trail. Located off 16 WV part of the 91 mile Head of the Dragon Motorcycle Ride, in McDowell County.

Quiet Neighborhood in a welcoming small town with all the conveniences Restaurants,  Grocery store  and gas station.

War is a ATV friendly town, so you can feel free to ride your ATV everywhere during the duration of your stay  or directly to the trail head with no trailering

Day trips in the area:
86 Miles to New River Gorge
64 Miles to Beckley Exibition Coal Miner Youth Museum

**Check out our other Listings**
Cove Suite
The Calvary House
The Calvary Suite

sectionedDescription/space:
Features 2 bedrooms, 1 full bath with washer and dryer, Eat in galley kitchen living room.
it sleeps 6 and is fully equipped with clean linens, towels and bedding.
The bathroom features a 36" ceramic tile shower. 
Livingroom has a 55" Roku flat screen TV and Wifi. It also has a sofa and chair.
Fully equipped kitchen with dishes, flatware and kitchen utensils. Covered front porch with Bbq grill and outdoor seating. 
Look us up on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.
sectionedDescription/summary:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart...
Surrounded by mountains and located right around the corner from the Hatfield McCoy Warrior Trailhead office.
Enjoy High Rocks, Wilmore Dam or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, hiking or boating. 
Easy access to restaurants, gas station, and grocery store. We are an ATV friendly town and House is located in quiet friendly neighborhood with plenty of parking.

sectionedDescription/access: You will have the entire cabin to yourself. You can go for a walk, enjoy the hot tub, grill out, roast marshmallows over the fire pit, or just rock on the front porch and take it easy.
sectionedDescription/description:
You will relax and reconnect in this beautiful valley nestled in the Southwest Virginia mountains. Sit on the porch and soak up those mountain views. Relax in the hot tub and count the stars. Reconnect with your spouse as you unplug from the hustle and bustle. Rest, laugh, enjoy! 

The cabin is located on a working family farm. You can purchase beef, pork, and chicken to cook while you’re here or bring a cooler and take some home.

Take a break from life. Get away. Come relax in solitude or with your spouse. Reconnect with nature. Breathe in that fresh air. Observe wildlife and get a taste of life on the farm.

The cabin completely private, but if you’d like to visit with family or friends there is another cabin located on the farm too. Check out our other listing for Valley View Cabin. You cannot see the other cabin, but it is located a couple hundred yards away.

You will have the entire cabin to yourself. You can go for a walk, enjoy the hot tub, grill out, roast marshmallows over the fire pit, or just rock on the front porch and take it easy.

We are available by phone (call or text) if you need anything.  We can offer suggestions of things to do while here (folder of information in the cabin). If we’re around we’d be happy to show you around the farm.

We are about a mile off of Hwy 16 (Back of the Dragon). About 10 miles from Hungry Mother State Park (hiking, fishing, beach swimming area...). We’re 25 minutes from Marion where there is an adorable Main Street with shops and eateries.  We are about 45 minutes from Abingdon (Barter Theatre, antique shopping, dining, winery...).

We are not near any public transportation.

We are about 25 minutes away from town. So, you may want to plan to stop at the grocery store on your way in. There are plenty of great restaurants in Marion. (We have a list of restaurants and activities to do while here.) FYI: Many of the Marion shops/restaurants are CLOSED on Mondays!

On our farm we raise and sell pastured beef, chicken, and pork. If you plan to cook while you are here let us know and you can order some homegrown meat ahead of time and we will have it waiting in your fridge. (Sausage or bacon for breakfast, steaks, hamburger, chicken breast, pork chops...) Bring a cooler so you can take some beef, chicken, and pork back home with you. You can see what's available and order directly through our website www.oldrichvalleyfarm dot com.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Hot tubs are very expensive.  We ask that you read and follow all rules of the hot tub (listed in the cabin) to make sure it doesn’t get damaged.  

This is a working farm. We ask that you are very careful around the animals and stay off of all farm equipment.

additionalHouseRules: ***IMPORTANT*** PETS: We do allow pets Non-Aggressive and Trained pets Only. You must check the pet box when making your reservation. There are to be no more than 2 pets per apartment. This must be disclosed to us before booking. If having a pet is not disclosed,  you may be asked to leave or you may get locked out of your apartment until the reservation is changed. There is a pet fee of $30. If you are here for an extended period there will be an additional charge sent through the resolution center. It will not exceed a total pet fee of $150. Please check for this on the day of your arrival or possibly the following day if it pertains to you.

name: (U3) High end modern well equiped apartment
sectionedDescription/access:
There is free street parking and also a free parking garage is only 1 block away.
There are stairs to climb to reach your apartment.
sectionedDescription/description:
Surround yourself with style in this standout space.

Enjoy a great nights sleep on a premium mattress with whisper quiet remote ac. 
If you feel the need or just want to cook, all of the appliances are top of the line.
And no need to run out to do your laundry. You can do it in your apartment while you relax and watch one of the 2 smart tv’s.

There is free street parking and also a free parking garage is only 1 block away.
There are stairs to climb to reach your apartment.

We are available as needed, but would love to meet each guest.

We are located right in the very heart of downtown Pikeville. All things downtown are within walking distance. UPike, med school, optometry school, Appalachian Wireless arena, heritage museum, shopping and restaurants. 
Pikeville Medical Center is also within walking distance

While everything inside the city is within walking distance,if you decide to venture out,you will need a car.

CLEANING FEE: 
$20 for up to 6 nights
$50 for 6+ nights 
$100 for 28+ nights 
This has not been added as a nightly fee because all would be a set amount. 
There will be a request thru the resolution center on the 1st day of your stay, based on the length of your stay. 
PET FEE: 
$20 per night for up to 2 “Non- Aggressive” pets less than 20 pounds. 
Not to exceed $200
This fee has not been added as a nightly fee because all would be a set amount. 
There will be a request sent thru the resolution center on the 1st day of your stay, based on the length of your stay. 
If you do not disclose that there are pets, you may be asked to leave or you  will have the option to accept the request for the fee thru the resolution center. 
The number of people that will be in the unit must be disclosed also. There will be linens based on the number of people and the number of nights.

primaryHost/about:
My husband and I relocated to West Virginia in 2014 from Ohio. We run a ministry (A New Beginning) located downtown. 
We opened A Bit of Heaven Rental in Sept. 2018 when the trails opened in our area. We currently have 5 units we rent. We also opened A Scoop of Heaven Icecream in 2021.
We live local across the street from The Calvary House and are available if you need us. We love the small town atmosphere that our town has to offer and the friendly folks that live here.
I love to cook and spend time with our family and grandbabies. 
We enjoy meeting new people, having cookouts in the summer, and going to the lake.

sectionedDescription/access:
Guest have full access with private entrance and private parking. This unit is part of the main house but you will be amazed at how private it is.
Your own outdoor space with a firepit and bbq grill.
sectionedDescription/description:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart...

Surrounded by Mountains and conveniently located, direct access to Warrior Trailhead and High Rocks. Enjoy Wilmore Dam, or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, or hiking.

This can be purchased with the main house or as a stand alone unit. If purchased together the price will be reduced to $40 a night.
 Guest will have entire space to themselves.

Cozy suite convient for 1 or 2 people looking for a peaceful getaway. Features 1 Bedroom/1 Full Bath, and a Kitchenette with breakfast nook (refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker.) Comes with clean linens, towels, and bedding. 
Bedroom has a flatscreen TV with Roku access (Netflix, Prime etc.) and WIFI.
Has a private entrance.  Perfect for traveling with a group that purchases the main house but likes your own space or traveling as a couple alone.

Like us on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.

Your own outdoor space with a firepit and bbq grill.

Our Mission is to make your stay at The Cove Suite as enjoyable as possible.

We live locally and respect your privacy. We'll give you the space that you want or the help that you need.

Quiet Neighborhood, close to everything. Welcoming small town with all the conveniences.
Restaurants, grocery store and gas station. 

Warrior Trail with direct connection to Pinnacle Creek,  Indiana Ridge, and Pocahantas Trail.

Located off of RT 16 WV

War is a ATV friendly town, you are welcome to ride your ATV anywhere for the duration of your stay. No trailering to the trailhead entrance.

sectionedDescription/access: There will be one closet near the dining table that will be locked and not for guest use.
sectionedDescription/description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

This apartment is newly remodeled. I tried to go with the modern farm house style. The apartment is located on a hill with easy parking. The apartment is on the first floor. Each bedroom has a small closet and dresser.

There will be one closet near the dining table that will be locked and not for guest use.

If your stay is during the summer you might hear the lawn mower or the weed eater. You may also hear an occasional train.

Free easy parking in front of the apartment.

I have a no pet policy including service dogs because I have allergies. I am the one who cleans the apartment. I love animals but I am the one who cleans the apartment.I take prescribed allergy  medicines daily and monthly allergy shots. 

This apartment is in a great location for healthcare professionals or anyone traveling to nearby towns such as  ……..

. Prestonsburg 15 min. drive
. Martin 5 min. drive
. Pikeville 20-25 min. drive
. Paintsville 20-25 min. drive

I have had several long term guest working at Pikeville Medical, Prestonsburg ARH, and McDowell ARH.

sectionedDescription/description:
A historic two-room studio cottage built from Kentucky River rock. 

Entire cottage rented for your privacy. Recently renovated with the modern conveniences of a kitchenette, outdoor smoking area, Wi-Fi, DirectTV, and blackout curtains. High ceilings create a bright and spacious feel. 

Conveniently located close to downtown. Off street parking by your front door. Walk to Main Street, Appalshop, and Kentucky Mist Distillery as well as many other small businesses and restaurants

Sometimes
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Please eat in the kitchenette area.
No unregistered guests.
No large group gatherings or parties.
Absolutely no smoking inside and if you smoke outside, please put your butts in the ashtray.
Check out by noon.

name: The Harry Caudill on Main Street Downtown
primaryHost/about: Reading, writing, painting, and traveling.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported smoke or carbon monoxide detectors on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
The Harry Caudill.  That’s right, his office was located right here.  Come and see if you can capture the creative spirit of this Appalachian writer.  To help get the creative juices flowing, the space is located above the longest running watering hole in Letcher County, Summit City located right in the middle of Main Street.

The Apartment is located above Summit City a bar and restaurant. They always have great bands on the lineup so check their schedule on Facebook. They also have the best gourmet hot dogs around! 

A note... Since it is located above a music destination the noise could be noisy at times. we have provided a thick rug and white noise machine in the bedroom just in case

I wont be there when you check in but I'm available by text message for anything you may have a question about and will try to provide anything you may need if I can.

Located right on Main Street in historic downtown Whitesburg this relaxing apartment for two is perfect for your stay. It has 4 Large windows that you can look out onto Main street perfect for viewing the festivals or entertainment nights the town may provide (perfect for people watching). The apartment is also located near the walking/Fitness trail which is located behind the building and over the red bridge, Bad Branch Falls for hiking just across pine mountain, and also pine mountain itself. You cant get a better sunset than right there and they have magical overlooks provided all along the mountainside to enhance the experience. Main Street itself boasts many restaurants including Heritage Kitchen for all your home cooked favorites and Dawhares 109 who's throwing out decadent hand tossed pizzas. If its beverages your after then there is Willy's Taphouse who has the most taps around for all your drinking desires and if you are looking something alittle stronger you MUST visit Kenutcky Mist Moonshine Distillary which is an easy walk from the apartment.  Otherwise if its shopping your looking for I can recommend The Cozy Corner for all your Appalachian gift needs and Annie's Frugal Finery for a last minute clothes haul. The apartment is also conveniently located right next to the Harry Caudill Library which also has events regularly including yoga and paint classes, and the rec center is another short walk for all your gym needs. It has a indoor walking track, basketball and volleyball courts and a indoor rock climbing wall!

Small Town means no public transportation but a lot is just a walk away otherwise its very easy to get around in a car. but if you don't want to get out here's a hot tip! Paradise Pizza Delivers!

sectionedDescription/description:
Contemporary studio apartment in refurbished church. Newly remodeled. Perfect for traveling nurses and visiting students. Walking distance to UPIKE and very close to Pikeville Medical Center. Off street parking. Guests have private apartment with rain shower and washer dryer. Studio opens out into large kitchen and living area common to other units. Wifi included. Access to loft study area. 30 day minimum stay.

The guest will share a large common kitchen and living area with others, but have their own bathroom and washer dryer.

Host is easily reached with any issues.

sectionedDescription/description:
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun. Enjoy the Hatfield McCoy trails, visit Chief Logan state park  have a cookout camp out,or just sit out under the stars. Located Two and a half miles off of US 119. In between Chapmanville and Logan. Lots of parking you can ride your ATV from the house to the trail connector less than 5 minutes away.

4 Queen Beds 2 twin Ibeds available(upon request) 2 Bedrooms Large Kitchen 1 Bath with Tub and Shower, Covered Porch, 2 TV'S 1 65 inch and  1  55 inch with  WI FI BBQ Grill

Free parking with lots of room for ATV Trailers

Quiet relaxing neighborhood.  Easy access to the Hatfield McCoy trail from the house.

Located in  between  Chapmanville and Logan.  Minutes from Hatfield McCoy trails. Ride your ATV directly from the house to trail connector.

we can be easily contacted by phone if you need help with anything or have a request, we will work with you to make your stay enjoyable.

sectionedDescription/access:
Enjoy the privacy of an entire house that features 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, and a full kitchen that is dedicated solely to guest use.

There’s no need to hassle with keys.  The front door has a key code that will be shared upon booking.
sectionedDescription/description:
*If you book for 7 days or more, you will receive a 20% discount off your stay.  

Our home is perfect for your visit in Pikeville, especially for a large group. Enjoy the complete home with 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, a complete kitchen with dishwasher, & washer/dryer. You'll enjoy a good nights sleep in a quiet space on high quality mattresses. We are located just down the street from a Food City. We have free WIFI & a Smart TV (NO CABLE TV). We’re a short 5 minute drive from downtown Pikeville.

Family oriented or perfect for the business travelers. This home is spacious, clean, and conveniently located.

Enjoy the privacy of an entire house that features 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, and a full kitchen that is dedicated solely to guest use.

There’s no need to hassle with keys.  The front door has a key code that will be shared upon booking.

I am available via email at dreamfurniture@aol.com.

The house is conveniently located in the Indian Hills community in Pikeville.  Food City is conveniently located just down the street approximately 0.2 miles, for any necessities you may need. Breaks Interstate Park is a short 25 mile scenic drive as well.

Parking is available directly in front of the house.

There’s no need to hassle with keys.  The front door has a key code that will be shared upon booking.

name: Heavens Porch - Eastern KY Luxury Cabin Rental
photos/0/caption: Private cabin rental at Yatesville Lake State Park boasts some of the most amazing views in all of Kentucky. Heaven's Porch has 2 large bedrooms, 1.5 baths and sleeps up to 7 people. The romantic cabin getaway has a great lake view on 170 acres.
photos/1/caption: One of the things our guest love most about Heaven's Porch is the serenity of the location.  Knestled in the hills, you'll enjoy the lost art of porch time.
photos/2/caption: Private cabin rental at Yatesville Lake State Park boasts some of the most amazing views in all of Kentucky.  Heaven's Porch has 2 large bedrooms, 1.5 baths and sleeps up to 7 people.  The romantic cabin getaway has a seasonal lake view and sits on 170 acres of Appalachian hills.  All that the Smoky Mountains, Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg would offer in a cabin rental at half the price.
photos/3/caption: Front porch hot tub with amazing views and easy access.  Watch the sunset from the best view Eastern KY has to offer.
photos/4/caption: Enjoy an evening fire as the sunset on your lake view.  With the State of Kentucky owning almost all of the land around the Lake, this is one of the few properties that have a seasonal lake view.  The water is drawn back by the Dam in the winter.
photos/5/caption: Modern Rustic design includes a reclaimed tobacco barn wood Kentucky state, custom made rustic cedar furniture throughout.
photos/6/caption: Authentic leather Dexter Club chair and ottoman from Lazyboy.  Great place to take a nap.
photos/7/caption: Open space makes for great entertaining and relaxation space.  Lots of natural sun light fills the living room.
photos/8/caption: Watch the big game with friends.
photos/9/caption: Whether its a couple celebrating their anniversary or a family wanting to relax.  We've got it all here for you.
photos/10/caption: This cabin is ALL wood.  Lay down on the couch, take a nap, watch tv, talk to your lovely wife.
photos/11/caption: Board games, arcade table, plenty of things to do for the kids.
photos/12/caption: All the room you would want.
photos/13/caption: Comfort equals high quality furniture.  Our guests love the high end leather couches we provide.
photos/14/caption: Dream cabin kitchen, fully stocked. Modern rustic design built in 2018.  Open and spacious with every detail thought of for your vacation stay.
photos/15/caption: Knotty hickory cabinets, granite stone counter tops, stainless appliances, rustic cedar island, fully stocked with all your needs to cook and eat a Thanksgiving meal!
photos/16/caption: Custom rustic bar height table seats 6.
photos/17/caption: Open cabin concept makes entertaining easy.
photos/18/caption: Handmade rustic cedar island with custom stools.
photos/19/caption: First floor full bath with laundry available for our guests.
photos/20/caption: Master bedroom boast plenty of natural sunlight, an arcade table and a private 2nd story porch with lakeviews.
photos/21/caption: High speed WiFi connected to all the smart tv's in the cabin.
photos/22/caption: Plenty of room in the Master Bedroom.  43" 4k Smart TV with cable, Netflix and Amazon Prime for late night movies from the comfort of your bed.
photos/23/caption: Romantic getaways, Anniversary gifts and honeymoons are favorites here at Heaven's Porch.
photos/26/caption: This bedroom sleeps up to 5 with a daybed and trundle and an additional trundle under the queen size bed.
photos/27/caption: You'll enjoy the craftsmanship of the rustic cedar wood throughout the cabin.
photos/28/caption: Easy access to half bath on the second floor, creatively decorated.
photos/29/caption: Private patio fire pit with custom made wood furniture with lake and mountain view.
photos/30/caption: Lots of open spaces.  Why guests are giving us nothing but a 5 star rating!
photos/31/caption: 3-4 person hot tub, but best for just 2.  The best Anniversary or Romantic getaway you could dream of.
photos/32/caption: Walk to fish the lake or just gaze.  Rent our kayaks and walk across the country road to find some of the best kayaking around.
photos/33/caption: Privacy cabin retreat gives you all the relaxation you've been looking for.
photos/34/caption: The sunset is the best.  It reminds you what is important.
photos/35/caption: Call it home for a week and you wont want to leave.
photos/36/caption: Heaven's Porch where time slows down and you can breath.  The luxury cabin rental you can afford.  From our family to yours, its all there to escape and explore.
photos/37/caption: Of course there is a swing.

primaryHost/about: The Boggs family is offering their private vacation home nestled in the hills of Eastern Kentucky at Yatesville Lake State Park.  We take great pride in offering a luxurious cabin rental for your vacation, anniversary, golfing, fishing and hiking getaway.  You'll be pleased with your stay, just check out the pictures.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest access to the cabin will be a unique numeric password sent.  Just push the code into the front door to gain access.
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Heavens Porch, a secluded and luxurious private cabin rental by owner at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky.
Located in a secluded hillside this cabin is perfect for your fishing, golfing, family or just a romantic getaway.

Welcome to Heavens Porch, the sister cabin of Sacred Winds, a secluded and luxurious private cabin rental by owner at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky. The open cabin feel invites you to sit back and relax away from it all. 

The #1 Cabin Rental in Eastern Kentucky. With over 100 5 Star Reviews, we recently purchased this second cabin for our guests.  Heavens Porch sleeps up to 7 guests and features all high end furniture, appliances and electronics. Sitting on the side of a picturesque mountain top within Yatesville Lake State Park in Louisa, KY, this 1,300 square foot vacation lodge is perfect for your fishing, golfing, family or just romantic getaway vacation. 

This year around vacation home is a popular stay and play at the famous Eagle Ridge Golf Course at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky. The Heavens Porch cabin is also a favorite for Romantic Getaways, family vacations or a small retreat. 

Amenities include: Indoors - A buckstove propane fireplace, 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bath, custome made Red Cedar Log Queen Bed with Tempur-Pedic mattress, Italian leather sectional and lounging chairs, custom made Red Cedar 6 person bar table and chairs, granite kitchen countertops, custom log island with barstools, stainless steel appliances, upscale washer and dryer, 60 inch Smart 4K HD TV with Youtube Live TV including all network and news channels and Netflix on all tvs, Classic Nintendo game system and of course we have high speed fiber internet access with a wireless router...... and this is only what's on the inside. 

Outdoors: Large 2 story porch with amazing private scenic views, porch swing, rocking chairs, park-like charcoal grill and wicker couch, firepit, over 170 acres of roaming room and the adventures of a life time with Yatesville Lake State Park. This cabin is nestled in a wooded niche on a very secluded hill. 

This luxury cabin will resemble the best that the Smoky Mountains or Hocking Hills has to offer and it's all hear in Eastern Kentucky. * Rates are based on 4 guests. To keep the costs low we do not charge a larger rate for only 4 guests. $15 per additional guests is 40% lower than the average cabin rental. Our cabin is comparable to a $275 a night cabin in the Smoky Mountains.  Cleaning fee of $49 is significantly lower than the $300 average cleaning fee in Pigeon Forge cabin rentals.

What you need to bring: Your own food, shampoos and soap. Food. Walmart is 5 miles away in Louisa just off Route 23. Only 1 hour away from Carter Caves. Non-Smoking, preferably no pets. Things to Do: Golf - Nationally Recognized Eagle Ridge Golf Course. Hiking - Yatesville Lake State Park is home to the infamous Mary Ingels Trail 3.5 Miles. ATV Riding - Eastern Kentucky is famous for back country ATV riding including the famous Hatfield & McCoy trails. This cabin is about an hour from a Trail Head of Hatfield & McCoy. Fishing - Some of the best bass fishing in the country is located 1 mile from this cabin. Fish 26 miles of Yatesville Lake, bring your boat. Horseback Riding at Yatesville Lake State Park. We look forward to sharing our personal retreat cabin with you and your friends and family.

Guest access to the cabin will be a unique numeric password sent.  Just push the code into the front door to gain access.
